title: Dolphin Shirt Co California Flag Neon Retro Text Zip-up Hoodie
features: Full-zip, Pre-Laundered, Cotton/Poly Blend, Unisex Sized Sweatshirt
Lightweight fabric with contrasting zipper and drawstring
Runs large for girls, order one size down
Design may appear smaller, or larger depending on size purchased. Printed In San Luis Obispo, CA
description: Be seen in one of the highest-quality zip-up hoodies around. For over 30 years, California Republic Clothes products have been printed in beautiful San Luis Obispo, California, and we use only the finest garments. Our shirts, hoodies, tanktops, and other products have been sold just about everywhere, from the California State Capitol building in Sacramento to museum gift shops worldwide. This premium, super soft, lightweight fleece zip-up offers a slim fit and quality construction. Whether you're rocking the California Republic Bear Flag, Marilyn Monroe, a cosmic space-exploring astronaut, or one of our popular sea life designs, this zip-up won't let you down. Don't settle for anything less than the original - California Republic Clothes. Product Care: Our zip-ups are pre-shrunk, machine washable, and dryer friendly. As a side effect of the printing process you may see a small faint box on your garment. This will go away after a wash or two. All our products are backed by our top-notch customer service.
